extendedInfo.description: Please buy "PhotoVault Pro Key" for the pro version (All ads removed).Do you have private pictures/videos that you don't want your friends or coworkers to see? PhotoVault will help you keep them in your privacy space.Just open your gallery, select the pictures or videos you want to hide and then select share & pick PhotoVault to hide the media. Open PhotoVault and enter your password to see you hidden pictures. Use PhotoVault to hide pictures and videos. It is very simple to use!Here is a simple how-to guide:Find media when switch to a new phone   1. insert your old sdcard to your new phone;   2. Install PhotoVault on your new phone;   3. Try to find your media in PhotoVault;Forget passcode   1. Uninstall PhotoVault;   2. Install PhotoVault again;   3. All protected medias will not be lost; Add Media to PhotoVault   1. Open the image and video gallery on your phone;   2. Select one or more pictures or movies;   3. Open the âShareâ menu;   4. Select âPhotoVaultâ;   5. Wait for the media to be moved (it make take a while if you have moving a lot of files or large movies);   6. DO NOT DELETE YOUR OWN PICTURES OR VIDEOS!  If they are still in your gallery then they were not moved to the PhotoVault.  PhotoVault will remove them from your gallery once they are completely transfered to the PhotoVault;Remove Images/Videos From PhotoVault   1. Open PhotoVault;   2. Press and Hold on the image/video you would like to return to the gallery;   3. Tap any other images/videos you would like to unvault to turn the text color highlighted;   4. Press the âUnvaultâ button;Set up a password & unlock pattern   1. Open PhotoVault;   2. Press the menu button;   3. Tap âLock Optionsâ;   4. Type unlock code or unlock pattern;   5. Choose unlock mode in âSet Unlock Modeâ;   6. Now PhotoVault will ask you for your password or pattern when you open it;Change Password & unlock pattern   1. Open PhotoVault;   2. Press the menu button;   3. Tap âLock Optionsâ;   5. Type new unlock code or unlock pattern;   6. Choose unlock mode in âSet Unlock Modeâ;   7. Now PhotoVault will require your new password or pattern when you open it;Remove Password & unlock pattern   1. Open PhotoVault;   2. Press the menu button;   3. Tap âRemove Lockâ;   5. Press the âOKâ button in confirm dialog;   6. Now PhotoVault will NOT ask you for a password or pattern when you open it;Forget Password & unlock pattern   1. Uninstall âPhotoVaultâ and install it again;   2. All protected medias would not be lost;This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: I had this app befor i installed it in my new phone and i cant retrieve any ofmy photos.. PLEASE HELP!!!

reviews.title: Too invasive with all the ads
reviews.comment: Works OK, but ads are a bit too aggressive.
reviews.author: Sven Lauterwasser

reviews.title: Could be a lot better
reviews.comment: This is a decent app but could be awesome.  It needs the option to store to sd card.  And awful ads putting icons on your phone as soon as you open it.
reviews.author: brian connelly

reviews.title: Turn off data before use!
reviews.comment: Free version is plagued with ads and sometimes wont even allow you to access your pics because ads pop up before you can enter your password. Used to be good but ads have ruined this program. Turning off data can stop ads from opening allowing use, but it shouldn\'t been required just to use the program. Use another app.
reviews.author: Andre Taylor

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: I lost all my pictures i had about 80 pix on there and now they are all gone i don\'t get it I\'m do mad!

reviews.title: Worst app you\'ll ever have I seriously think it is a virus
reviews.comment: As soon as you download it icons will pop up all over your screen and you will continually get advertisements coming up in your status bar and it will sound like you\'re getting text messages all day long I have never rated a app before but this one is so horrible I had to take the time to do it. Not to mention that my pictures were all in some in cryptid file when I tried to remove them out of photo vault. There\' I\'m currently using keep safe and totally love it has great features

reviews.title: Distrustful Application!
reviews.comment: Don t trust this free application to keep your picture. The free application will not run after sometime. And... you will lost your valuable pictures!

reviews.comment: Too many pop up windows and spam. Don\'t waste your time with it, it\'s totally NOT worth it. If I could give it 0 stars if it would let me.

reviews.title: Free Version Terrible
reviews.comment: This loads a bunch of icons all over your desktop trying to sell you stuff and drops stuff in the status bar all the time. Developer should be ashamed. Give better features to purchasers, not spam up free users phones. I won\'t buy the paid version now cause I think its spyware.
